message.body: Why the heck did you ignore me while you were in town?

Girl I did not ignore u. I was t the shop till late I missed you like hell. I had a lit of responsibility that night my phone wasn't my biggest priority. What days do you have off? Let's make plans easy
I'm sorry, I was feeling really sensitive yesterday. Are you in philly all week?
No I had to go back yesterday. I am doing a show in ny sat.
You don't have to apologize to me ever
I have been really sensitive too
I miss you too. In so angry right now. My job is so infuriating
It's just piontless it irks me do much
Let's talk asap, everything is pissing me off right now.
Yeah u can call now if you like
i'm at work, can we tallk later?
Yes yes I'm at work too so it's all good
